text: Bruce Franklin Reed (July 11, 1954 â€“ February 5, 2021) was an American professional wrestler and football player, better known by the ring name Butch Reed. He played college football at the University of Central Missouri. He appeared in Mid-South Wrestling and tag team matches in the World Wrestling Federation and World Championship Wrestling. On February 5, 2021, he died at the age of 66 from problems caused by two heart attacks. He tested positive for COVID-19 a month before his death. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American professional wrestlers Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Butch Reed
